About.title: About Me
About.name: Michael Quesada Vega
About.text: Web developer, passionate about creating dynamic and functional web applications. My dedication and curiosity to learn new technologies drives me to continuously improve my skills.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio Showcase
Portfolio.text: Explore my journey through the projects I've developed.

project-fullstack-ecommerce.title: Full Stack Ecommerce
project-fullstack-ecommerce.description: Shopper is a full-stack ecommerce project based on a online  clothing store, In this project technologies such as ReactJS in the frontend, Java in the backend and a Supabase postgreSql database were used.

project-hausdorff-school.title: Escuela Hausdorff
project-hausdorff-school.description: Escuela de matem√°tica Hausdorff is a real-client project, it was built using CMS Wordpress and Elementor. With more than 10 years this bussiness has helped more than 1000 students around the Central and South America.

project-mediabot-portfolio.title: Mediabot Portfolio
project-mediabot-portfolio.description: Mediabot Portfolio is a concept project based on a web development services website. In this project, technologies such as HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT and PHP were used.

project-nike-ecommerce.title: Nike Ecommerce
project-nike-ecommerce.description: Nike Ecommerce is a concept project based on an ecommerce website dedicated to sell nike products. In this project technologies such as HTML, CSS and JAVASCRIPT were used.

project-villa-noemy.title: Villa Noemy
project-villa-noemy.description: Villa Noemy is a real-client project developed in Wordpress, using Elementor, motopress plugin. It has functionalities such as payment methods, booking, contact form and SEO best practices.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.subtitle: Got a question? Send a message and I'll get back to you soon.
